sapientml.util package¶

Submodules¶

sapientml.util.json_util module¶

class sapientml.util.json_util.JSONDecoder(*, object_hook=None, parse_float=None, parse_int=None, parse_constant=None, strict=True, object_pairs_hook=None)[source]¶

Bases: JSONDecoder

Decoding Json

default(obj)[source]¶

default method for JSONEncoder.

Parameters¶

obj : Instance of the object

Results¶

Depends upon the instance

if instance is nan, it will return np.nan. if instance is inf, it will return np.inf. if instance is -inf, it will return -np.inf.

class sapientml.util.json_util.JSONEncoder(*, skipkeys=False, ensure_ascii=True, check_circular=True, allow_nan=True, sort_keys=False, indent=None, separators=None, default=None)[source]¶

Bases: JSONEncoder

Encoding Json

default(obj)[source]¶

default method for JSONEncoder.

Parameters¶

obj : Instance of the object

Results¶

Depends upon the instance type

if instance is integer, it will return int. if instance is float, it will return float. if instance is string, it will return string. if instance is UUID, it will returns string.
